skills.name: COMMAND
desc: • Deals physical damage to a single target.
• 50% Chance to Steal Power and Fury.
• Damage scales based on your MAX HP.

skills.name: GRAND STRATEGY
desc: • Gives Critical Strike chance to all allies.
• Grants Perfect Hit to all allies.

skills.name: TERMS OF WAR
desc: Grant Increased DEF and Golden Hit to all allies for 3 turns at the start of battle. Grant a Physical, Magic, or True Block to each ally if Regen is present at the start of your turn. Curse all enemies that lack beneficial effects for 2 turns after each action.
